mapper.select: SELECT edms_doc_no , id , title , content , file_name , attatch , submit_dt , approval_dt , approval_status , edms_form_no , share_status , share_folder_no , reject_reason FROM edms_doc WHERE edms_doc_no = #{edmsDocNo}

SELECT d.edms_doc_no , d.id , d.title , d.content , d.file_name , d.submit_dt , d.approval_dt , d.approval_status , d.edms_form_no , d.share_status , d.share_folder_no , a.approval_order FROM edms_doc d LEFT JOIN approval_line a ON d.edms_doc_no = a.edms_doc_no WHERE d.approval_status = #{approvalStatus} AND d.id = #{userId} ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC
